mapper.select: SELECT r.Routine_Review_Number, r.Routine_Number, r.Routine_Review_Title, m.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(r.Routine_Review_Created_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') AS Routine_Review_Created_Date, TO_CHAR(r.Routine_Review_Updated_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') AS Routine_Review_Updated_Date, r.Routine_Review_Content FROM TBL_ROUTINE_REVIEW r JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON r.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE r.Routine_Review_Number = #{routineReviewNumber}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT r.ROUTINE_REVIEW_NUMBER, r.ROUTINE_REVIEW_TITLE, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(r.ROUTINE_REVIEW_CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') AS ROUTINE_REVIEW_CREATED_DATE, TO_CHAR(r.ROUTINE_REVIEW_UPDATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') AS ROUTINE_REVIEW_UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_ROUTINE_REVIEW r JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON r.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY ROUTINE_REVIEW_CREATED_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
